patthana15.12:1.1: Nahetuṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
patthana15.12:2.1: Hetuṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.12:3.1: Hetuṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
